headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX): Evaluating Valuation After Landmark GMLRS Propulsion Contract and Defense Tech Milestones
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) just landed its largest ever Guided Multiple Launch Rocket System Insensitive Munition propulsion contract, a follow on deal worth up to $200 million that leans on its expanded Arkansas capacity. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. The new propulsion award builds on a year where L3Harris has showcased next generation communications tech for U.S. agencies and delivered a robust year to date share price return of 38.38%, with multi year total...

headline: Private Markets: Musk’s SpaceX targets 2026 IPO at valuation of $1.5T
summary: Elon Musk’s SpaceX is moving ahead with plans for an initial public offering that would seek to raise “significantly more” than $30B at a market value of about $1.5T. Meanwhile, Agentic engineering startup Port raised $100M in a Series C funding round at $800M valuation. headline: How Investors Are Reacting To L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Record GMLRS Contract And Camden Capacity Expansion
summary: L3Harris Technologies recently received a follow-on production contract worth up to US$200 million from Lockheed Martin to supply Guided Multiple Launch Rocket System Insensitive Munition propulsion units, with manufacturing centered at its new Camden, Arkansas facility that lifts annual capacity by more than 30%. This is the company’s largest 12‑month GMLRS IM award from Lockheed Martin and highlights how its expanded energetics footprint is being used to meet heightened rocket motor...
